name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess expertise in **Angular**, **TypeScript**, **Kotlin**, **Swift**, **Python**, **Django**, **Express**, **NestJS**, **PostgreSQL**, **SQLite**, REST APIs, and **Docker**. My technical proficiency extends to modern front-end and back-end development, enabling the creation of robust, high-performance applications. I have demonstrated success in CI/CD pipelines, utilizing tools like **Git**, **GitHub**, and testing frameworks such as **Jest**, **Jasmine**, and **Pytest**. 

In addition to my technical skills, I have ample experience in healthcare and financial sectors, with a strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. I have effectively led the development of enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing, building secure applications that ensure data integrity. My hands-on experience encompasses deploying machine learning models and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow** and **Kubernetes**. Furthermore, I am proficient in design tools like **Figma** and have a strong commitment to best practices in Cyber Security.
